passive_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
passive_abilities.description: The swarm is able to move freely throughout the battlefield.

effect.description: It is able to occupy enemy spaces, move through enemy spaces, and is immune to exposed attacks.

passive_abilities.name: Toe Nibbler
passive_abilities.description: Whenever an enemy begins their turn within the swarm, they take damage as the swarm nips at their heels.

combat_actions.name: Vicious Consumption
combat_actions.description: The swarm crawls up an enemy, a hundred mouths gnawing as it flows up and over them.

effect.description: Its target must make a spell power saving throw or become Distracted until the end of its next turn.

passive_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
passive_abilities.description: The swarm is able to move freely throughout the battlefield.

effect.description: It is able to occupy enemy spaces, move through enemy spaces, and is immune to exposed attacks.

passive_abilities.name: Great Chomps
passive_abilities.description: Whenever an enemy begins their turn within the swarm, they take damage as the swarm nips at their heels.

combat_actions.name: Vicious Consumption
combat_actions.description: The swarm crawls up an enemy, a hundred mouths gnawing as it flows over them.

effect.description: Its target must make a spell power saving throw or become Distracted until the end of its next turn.

passive_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
passive_abilities.description: The swarm is able to move freely throughout the battlefield.

effect.description: It is able to occupy enemy spaces, move through enemy spaces, and is immune to exposed attacks.

passive_abilities.name: Great Chomps
passive_abilities.description: Whenever an enemy begins their turn within the swarm, they take damage as the swarm nips at their heels.

combat_actions.name: Vicious Consumption
combat_actions.description: The swarm crawls up an enemy, a hundred mouths gnawing as it flows up and over them.

effect.description: Its target must make a spell power saving throw or become Distracted until the end of its next turn.

combat_actions.name: Grab
combat_actions.description: The hand sweeps towards an enemy in an attempt to grab them.

effect.description: The target must make a spell power save or be Grappled.

combat_actions.name: Slam
combat_actions.description: The hand balls into a fist and lashes out an a foe.

combat_actions.name: Toss
combat_actions.description: If the hand is adjacent to an ally or is grappling a foe, it can toss them as an action. If it is a foe, they and anyone they hit take damage.

combat_actions.name: Swiping Claw
combat_actions.description: The treeling takes a swipe at its foe with hardened, spearlike fingers.

passive_abilities.name: Oaken Shield
passive_abilities.description: The sap knight carries a shield of oak.

effect.description: So long as it wields it, it is considered Guarded.

combat_actions.name: Sap Strike
combat_actions.description: As the knight slashes an enemy with its sword, strands of sticky sap flow over them.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save of be Hindered.

passive_abilities.name: Shield
passive_abilities.description: The woad warrior carries a wall shield of Ironwood.

effect.description: It is immune to ranged attacks from the front, and gains +3 evasion while it is holding the shield.

combat_actions.name: Furious Strike
combat_actions.description: The woad warrior makes two furious strikes against it's foe.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save of be Hindered.

combat_actions.name: Heavy Blow
combat_actions.description: The woad warrior makes a slash through the air which is so heavy that it cuts everything in a fifteen foot arc before it.

combat_actions.name: Shield Bash
combat_actions.description: The woad warrior slams its shield into an enemy with its shield.

effect.description: The target must make a spell power save or be pushed back fifteen feet. If they strike a solid object, they take 1d6 damage. If they strike another creature, that creature takes the same amount of damage.

passive_abilities.name: Elemental Affinity
passive_abilities.description: When an Elemental comes into existence its creator may choose its elemental affinity from fire, ice, water, and air. All of the elemental's damage is of that type, and it has the associated resistance.

combat_actions.name: Elemental Burst
combat_actions.description: With a flash of energy, the Elemental Spark makes an attack against all creatures adjacent to them.

passive_abilities.name: Elemental Affinity
passive_abilities.description: When an Elemental comes into existence its creator may choose its elemental affinity from fire, ice, water, and air. All of the elemental's damage is of that type, and it has the associated resistance.

combat_actions.name: Elemental Blaze
combat_actions.description: With a flash of energy, the Elemental makes an attack against all creatures adjacent to them.

combat_actions.name: Elemental Strike
combat_actions.description: The Elemental makes two strikes in rapid succession against its foe.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Burned if it has fire affinity, Hindered if it has ice affinity, pushed back 15 feet if it has water affinity or Hoisted if it has air affinity.
effect.save: If the creature is hoisted, it may repeat its save at the end of each of its turns.

passive_abilities.name: Elemental Affinity
passive_abilities.description: When an Elemental comes into existence its creator may choose its elemental affinity from fire, ice, water, and air. All of the elemental's damage is of that type, and it has the associated resistance.

combat_actions.name: Elemental Fury
combat_actions.description: With blazing energy, the Elemental makes an attack against all creatures adjacent to them.

combat_actions.name: Elemental Strike
combat_actions.description: The Elemental makes two strikes in rapid succession against its foe.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Burned if it has fire affinity, Hindered if it has ice affinity, pushed back 15 feet if it has water affinity or Hoisted if it has air affinity.
effect.save: If the creature is hoisted, it may repeat its save at the end of each of its turns.

passive_abilities.name: Mother Bear
passive_abilities.description: A dire bear gains a frightening energy if their family is in harm's way.

effect.description: If a dire bear's cubs are in danger or if an ally is on death's door, they are affected by the Hastened condition.

passive_abilities.name: Cold Resistance
passive_abilities.description: Dire bears have thick hides and warm pelts.

effect.description: They are Resistant to Cold.

combat_actions.name: Claw
combat_actions.description: The bear swats at its foe with a massive claw.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be knocked Prone.

combat_actions.name: Maul
combat_actions.description: If a bear's target is prone, they may maul it, thrashing them about with fearsome jaws.

passive_abilities.name: Gelatinous Form
passive_abilities.description: Slimes are made of a viscous ooze which displaces when struck.

effect.description: Martial attacks are of little use against them, as they have Physical Resistance.

passive_abilities.name: Distributed Nervous System
passive_abilities.description: Slimes have no organs or other internal structures as most understand them.

effect.description: As such, they are not affected by fear, magics, or other conditions like the races of the realms, and are Immune.

passive_abilities.name: Corrosive Touch
passive_abilities.description: Slimes are able to move into the same space as the creature's they are trying to devour.

effect.description: If a creature begins its turn covered in slime, they take damage. They must then make a spell power save or be Halted. On success, they are instead Hindered for the rest of their turn.

passive_abilities.name: Creeping Movement
passive_abilities.description: Slimes move soundlessly, and can creep through spaces the size of a pinhole, though it takes them longer to move through small gaps.

combat_actions.name: Devouring Slime
combat_actions.description: The green slime oozes up and onto a creature, corroding and eating at them with its acid.

combat_actions.name: Greater Devouring Slime
combat_actions.description: The green slime oozes up and onto a creature, corroding and eating at them with its acid.

passive_abilities.name: Greater Gelatinous Form
passive_abilities.description: Black slimes are terrifyingly resilient against all damage.

effect.description: They benefit from Total Resistance.

passive_abilities.name: Distributed Nervous System
passive_abilities.description: Slimes have no organs or other internal structures as most understand them.

effect.description: As such, they are not affected by fear, magics, or other conditions like the races of the realms, and are Immune.

effect.description: If a creature begins its turn covered in slime, they take damage. They must then make a spell power save or be Halted. On success, they are instead Hindered for the rest of their turn.

passive_abilities.name: Creeping Movement
passive_abilities.description: Slimes move soundlessly, and can creep through spaces the size of a pinhole, though it takes them longer to move through small gaps.

combat_actions.name: Deadly Devouring Slime
combat_actions.description: The black slime oozes up and onto a creature, corroding and eating at them with its acid.

passive_abilities.name: Overdrive
passive_abilities.description: Gears clank and churn and the smell of heated metal fills the air as the construct forces itself into overdrive.

effect.description: For as long as it wishes, the construct is affected by the Hastened condition, but it takes 1d6 damage per turn.

passive_abilities.name: Detonate
passive_abilities.description: When the construct reaches zero health, it explodes in a hail of shrapnel. The construct may also choose to self destruct at any time.

combat_actions.name: Slashing Strike
combat_actions.description: The construct swings at its foe with an arm pronged with bits of sharpened metal.

combat_actions.name: Self Repair
combat_actions.description: In the heat of battle, the construct takes a moment to tend to its wounds, hastily grafting metal or wood over the holes in its frame.

passive_abilities.name: Overdrive
passive_abilities.description: Gears clank and churn and the smell of heated metal fills the air as the construct forces itself into overdrive.

effect.description: For as long as it wishes, the construct is affected by the Hastened condition, but it takes 2d6 damage per turn.

passive_abilities.name: Detonate
passive_abilities.description: When the construct reaches zero health, it explodes in a hail of shrapnel. The construct may also choose to self destruct at any time.

combat_actions.name: Slashing Strike
combat_actions.description: The construct swings at its foe with an arm pronged with bits of sharpened metal.

combat_actions.name: Arcane Slingshot
combat_actions.description: The construct chitters and churns as it quickly lines up and looses a projectile at its target.

combat_actions.name: Self Repair
combat_actions.description: In the heat of battle, the construct takes a moment to tend to its wounds, hastily grafting metal or wood over the holes in its frame.

combat_actions.name: Grappling Strike
combat_actions.description: The thrall latches onto its target, gripping tightly as it attempts to drag them to the ground.

effect.description: The creature must make a spell power save or become Grappled by the thrall.

combat_actions.name: Gnashing Bite
combat_actions.description: If a thrall attacks a grappled creature, they are able to bite it with gnashing, yellowed teeth.

passive_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
passive_abilities.description: The scent of blood whips the thrall into a wild frenzy.

effect.description: As soon as any thrall has made a Gnashing Bite attack against a hostile creature, they all are affected by the Frenzied condition for the ability's duration.

combat_actions.name: Grappling Strike
combat_actions.description: The thrall latches onto its target, gripping tightly as it attempts to drag them to the ground.

effect.description: The creature must make a spell power save or become Grappled by the thrall.

combat_actions.name: Gnashing Bite
combat_actions.description: If a thrall attacks a grappled creature, they are able to bite it with gnashing, yellowed teeth.

effect.description: The creature's veins turn black as poison radiates out from the bite. They must make a spell power save or be affected by Rot.

passive_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
passive_abilities.description: The scent of blood whips the thrall into a wild frenzy.

effect.description: As soon as any thrall has made a Gnashing Bite attack against a hostile creature, they all are affected by the Frenzied condition for the ability's duration.

combat_actions.name: Grappling Strike
combat_actions.description: The thrall latches onto its target, gripping tightly as it attempts to drag them to the ground.

effect.description: The creature must make a spell power save or become Grappled by the thrall.

combat_actions.name: Gnashing Bite
combat_actions.description: If a thrall attacks a grappled creature, they are able to bite it with gnashing, yellowed teeth.

effect.description: The creature's veins turn black as poison radiates out from the bite. They must make a spell power save or be affected by Rot.

passive_abilities.name: Pack Strength
passive_abilities.description: Wolves hunt better in packs.

effect.description: If two wolves are attacking the same target, they deal additional damage on each strike.

passive_abilities.name: Fear of Fire
passive_abilities.description: Wolves have a natural fear of fire.

effect.description: If another wolf is damaged by fire nearby, the wolf must make a spell power save against the attacker or become Frightened.
effect.save: This does not affect sentient creatures in wolf form.

combat_actions.name: Grappling Bite
combat_actions.description: The wolf tears at its foe with sharp teeth.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Hindered on their next turn.

combat_actions.name: Howl
combat_actions.description: The wolf lets a fearsome howl.

effect.description: All creatures within the howl's radius must make a spell power save or be Frightened.
effect.save: Affected creatures may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns.

passive_abilities.description: Wolves have a natural fear of fire.

effect.description: If another wolf is damaged by fire nearby, the wolf must make a spell power save against the attacker or become Frightened.
effect.save: This does not affect a werewolf that has retained its humanity.

passive_abilities.name: Vulnerable to Silver
passive_abilities.description: Werewolves are weak against silver.

effect.description: Attacks made with silvered weapons deal an additional 2d6 damage to a werewolf.

combat_actions.name: Grappling Bite
combat_actions.description: The werewolf tears at its foe with sharp teeth.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Hindered on their next turn.

combat_actions.name: Howl
combat_actions.description: The werewolf lets a fearsome howl.

effect.description: All creatures within the howl's radius must make a spell power save or be Frightened.
effect.save: Affected creatures may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns.

passive_abilities.name: Streak Past
passive_abilities.description: As the giant eagle attacks, it flies by with incredible speed.

effect.description: Eagles are always considered to be Elusive.

passive_abilities.name: Lesser Carry
passive_abilities.description: The giant eagle can carry up to one creature on its back.

combat_actions.name: Swipe
combat_actions.description: The eagle slashes its target with its talons as it streaks past.

passive_abilities.name: Streak Past
passive_abilities.description: As the giant eagle attacks, it flies by with incredible speed.

effect.description: Eagles are always considered to be Elusive.

passive_abilities.name: Carry
passive_abilities.description: The giant eagle can carry up to two creatures on its back.

combat_actions.name: Swipe
combat_actions.description: The eagle slashes its target with its talons as it streaks past.

effect.description: As the eagle strikes, it can choose to attempt to Grapple its foe.

combat_actions.name: Drop
combat_actions.description: If an eagle is grappling a creature, it may use its movement to lift them up to fifty feet in the air and drop them, dealing damage.

passive_abilities.name: Streak Past
passive_abilities.description: As the giant eagle attacks, it flies by with incredible speed.

effect.description: Eagles are always considered to be Elusive.

passive_abilities.name: Greater Carry
passive_abilities.description: The giant eagle can carry up to five creatures on its back.

combat_actions.name: Swipe
combat_actions.description: The eagle slashes its target with its talons as it streaks past.

effect.description: As the eagle strikes, it can choose to attempt to Grapple its foe.

combat_actions.name: Drop
combat_actions.description: If an eagle is grappling a creature, it may use its movement to lift them up to fifty feet in the air and drop them, dealing damage.

passive_abilities.name: Darkvision
passive_abilities.description: Giant spiders can see perfectly in the dark.

effect.description: They are considered to have Darkvision.

passive_abilities.name: Wall Climb
passive_abilities.description: Giant spiders are able to climb up even perfectly verticle surfaces.

combat_actions.name: Bite
combat_actions.description: Venom courses into the spider's quarry as it stabs with sharp fangs.

effect.description: The target must make a spell power save or be Poisoned.

combat_actions.name: Stinger
combat_actions.description: Black ichor pulses from the spider's stinger and into its foe.

effect.description: The target must make a spell power save or gain a level of Exhaustion.

combat_actions.name: Web Sling
combat_actions.description: The spider launches a gob of sticky web at its enemy.

effect.description: They must make a spell power save or be Grappled. On success, they are Hindered on their next turn.

passive_abilities.name: Waterbreathing
passive_abilities.description: The daggerfin breathes water, and begins to suffocate if removed.

passive_abilities.name: Streak Past
passive_abilities.description: As the daggerfin attacks, it streaks by with incredible speed.

effect.description: Daggerfin are always considered to be Elusive.

passive_abilities.name: Spectral Movement
passive_abilities.description: Spectral guardians can phase through most anything.

effect.description: When moving, they are considered Ethereal and are immune to exposed attacks.

combat_actions.name: Crippling Touch
combat_actions.description: The guardian reaches a hand into its foe. At once, they begin to wither and veins turn black.

effect.description: The target must make a spell power save or begin to Rot.

combat_actions.name: Viel of Disintigration
combat_actions.description: The guardian holds out a finger and points. Instantly, a 15ft wall of mist appears. Anyone who walks through it instantly takes 6d8 points of damage.
